title: The Quiet Triumph of Alice Hall
summary: Alice Hall, a 73-year-old woman who enjoys worshiping and meditating, discovers her unique ability to heal through spiritual energy, using it to help her community over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Alice Hall, eine 73-jährige Frau, die gerne betet und meditiert, entdeckt ihre einzigartige Fähigkeit, durch spirituelle Energie zu heilen, und nutzt sie, um ihrer Gemeinschaft im Laufe einer Woche zu helfen.
summaryDutch: Alice Hall, een 73-jarige vrouw die van aanbidden en mediteren houdt, ontdekt haar unieke vermogen om te genezen door spirituele energie, en gebruikt dit om haar gemeenschap gedurende een week te helpen.
summaryFrench: Alice Hall, une femme de 73 ans qui aime adorer et méditer, découvre sa capacité unique à guérir par l'énergie spirituelle, l'utilisant pour aider sa communauté au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Alice Hall starts her week with a peaceful morning meditation, feeling an unusual warmth spreading through her hands. Curious but serene, she embraces this new sensation.
Feeling empowered, Alice encounters a sick neighbor. Instinctively, she holds her hands over the ailing area, and to her and her neighbor's surprise, the pain eases.
Word spreads about Alice's healing touch. People start visiting her, hoping for relief. Alice feels a deep connection with each person she helps, fulfilling her sense of purpose.
The local news catches wind of Alice's abilities. They interview her, capturing the entire town's attention. Despite the buzz, Alice remains humble and focused.
As more people visit, Alice’s energy begins to wane. However, during her evening meditation, she feels reinvigorated by a mysterious, ethereal presence.
With renewed vigor, Alice continues to heal and even starts teaching others how to tap into their own spiritual energies, expanding her impact.
Reflecting on her week, Alice feels an overwhelming sense of peace and joy. She realizes she’s found her calling later in life and is grateful for this gift.

ending: In the quiet moments of life, great power can emerge.
moral: It's never too late in life to discover your true potential and make a difference.
